Sub topic: The patient needs to make weekly presentation to about 10 people, and it makes them really nervous and they sweat all over. The presentation is about five to 10 minutes. The patient starts feeling nervous from the day before they have to present, throughout the day. The patient had terrible time making presentations in high school and college too. The patient has ran out of meeting room once. In another instance when they felt like running out, the patient's coworkers and their manager got into an intense fight and the patient started feeling fine again. Making these presentation every week terrifies the patient, and they don't wish their boss to regret putting them into this work. The patient has started to drink a bit to cope with this.
